column1: emotions.csv
I am feeling so happy today!
This is the best day ever!
I can’t stop smiling, everything feels perfect.
I am really sad and nothing seems right.
Everything is falling apart, I feel broken.
I just want to cry all day.
I am so angry right now, this is unacceptable!
Why does everything make me furious?
I can’t control my anger anymore!
I am scared, this situation feels dangerous.
I feel so afraid and unsure about everything.
My heart is racing, I’m terrified.
This is disgusting, I can’t even look at it.
Eww, that smells horrible!
I feel so grossed out by this.
Wow, I didn’t expect that to happen!

I am genuinely surprised right now.
I love spending time with my family.
I feel so lonely, like nobody understands me.
I hate when people lie to me!
I fear losing the people I love.
That food tasted really awful.

I feel excited about my future.
I feel depressed and empty inside.
Stop bothering me! I’m really pissed!
I didn't see that coming at all!
I am worried something bad might happen.
